guest_info.name: Loodmy Jacques
guest_info.title: CEO and Founder
guest_info.location: Palm Beach, Broward, and St. Lucie counties in Florida

main_topics: Building a real estate business from scratch
The importance of kindness and professionalism
Building a successful real estate team

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Starting a real estate business without a sphere of influence
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Loodmy built his network by visiting Haitian-owned businesses and using the white pages to connect with people sharing his last name.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Keeping clients informed during the selling process
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Implemented a system of weekly emails and calls to update clients on marketing efforts and progress.

problems_addressed.specific_problem: Standing out in a competitive market
problems_addressed.solution_summary: Developed a unique selling proposition with the 'Jacques Team 360 system' to differentiate his services.

target_avatars.relevance: Loodmy shares how he started his career without a network, providing inspiration and tactics for new agents.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Focus on building relationships and providing value to potential clients, even without an existing network.

target_avatars.relevance: Insights on building a successful team and maintaining high standards of client communication.
target_avatars.key_takeaway: Establish clear systems and processes to ensure consistent client experiences and team efficiency.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: Every year, he would try to buy an investment property... in 30 years, you got 15, 20 of them paid in full and you're creating your own retirement.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Provides a clear, actionable strategy for wealth building.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Want to build wealth through real estate? Here's a simple strategy.

clip_worthy_moments.quote: I cannot beat them with the fancy car, but I'll build them with my kindness, my care, my knowledge, and ability to perform.
clip_worthy_moments.why_clipworthy: Challenges the notion that success is shown through material possessions.
clip_worthy_moments.suggested_hook: Think you need a fancy car to succeed in real estate? Think again.

key_tactics.tactic: Use local directories to connect with potential clients.
key_tactics.context: Loodmy used the white pages to find people with similar last names to build his network.

key_tactics.tactic: Implement a weekly client update system.
key_tactics.context: Send emails and make calls to keep clients informed about the marketing efforts and progress.

quotable_insights: Delivering a Ritz Carlton level experience where every buyer, seller, and investor feels valued.
If I am laughing at some scenario, I'm smiling. There's very hard way for somebody to be frowning back at me.

resources_mentioned.name: Real Geeks
resources_mentioned.context: Mentioned as a sponsor providing technology solutions for real estate agents.

resources_mentioned.name: corded.io
resources_mentioned.context: Mentioned as a sponsor providing AI-powered recruiting and retention tools.

episode_summary: In this episode, Loodmy Jacques shares his journey from Haiti to becoming a top real estate producer in Florida. He discusses strategies for building a network from scratch, the importance of consistent client communication, and how to leverage reviews for business growth. Loodmy also offers insights into building a successful real estate team and creating a standout personal brand.
